issue.title: unas.hu webshops broken because cookie notice non visible
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8, 4.7.1, other older versions

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

all Unas based website with cookie notice, for examples: vilbo.hu tukkii.com ledup.hu more examples: https://unas.hu/referenciak

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

Hungarian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hi, we have in Hungary, a Cloud base webshop system (like Shopify) known as Unas www.unas.hu. Used by hundreds of webshops. In this system, they used Cookie notice. With AdGuard Mobile, this notice hidden, but full with overlay broke sites. Can scroll up and down, but can not click anywhere or navigate on site, so site is broken. With turned of AdGuard Cookie Notices filter (or if use only AdGuard Annoyances filter turned of this) works properly. I tested with Fanboy's Annoyances and Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances filters and also works well. Please add exception or fix full width overlay that broke sites. Thank You :)

comment.body:
I guess that the problem is that script from `connatix.com` is loaded in `about:blank` iframe and source of this script is not detected by apps.
It looks like that as a workaround we could add `srcdoc` attribute to this `iframe` by using `$replace` rule like (seems to works fine on my end and referrer is added to request, though I'm not sure exactly why):
```adblock
||sport24.gr^$replace=/((.)\.src='javascript:false';)/\$1\$2.srcdoc='';/,document
```
After adding this rule clearing cache or refreshing website by using <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>F5</kbd> might be required.

comment.body:
MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
Until then you can add:
```adblock
summarizer.org###after-text-load-controls:has(> div[class^="ads_"])
```
to user ules.
